snippet.title: My indie game is on STEAM | Devlog 3
snippet.description:
Hey, thanks for watching the video! My DREAM indie Metroidvania game is now on Steam!

Wishlist the game!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2413330/Cavedin/

Discord | https://discord.gg/9z56CXaUWq
Itch.io | https://8x8bitgames.itch.io/
Music & SFX | Epidemic Sound

Timestamps:
0:00 Intro
0:26 Wishlist the game!
0:44 Added rooms to the game
1:02 The Hive
1:19 Weapon switching and new weapons
1:39 Menu rework
2:04 New dialogue system
2:20 Snowy area and Gunsmith
2:30 Gnome area
2:43 Paper Mario flipping animations
2:59 Checkered backgrounds
3:11 Desert biome
3:33 Map system
3:43 Dialogue details
4:00 Music composer + Music
4:37 Outro
